action.msg: Where the funk is this place at?
There's like, no signal here.
I'm starving.
For my affection?
For food, FEVER.
Right, right.
Where are we, anyways?
I didn't think Fever Town spanned this far out.
I'm sorry, can we help you?
Wait, don't tell me-
You're also someone who wants to battle for my title.
I can't go FUNKING anywhere without this shit happening.
Oh, it's not the title of mayor that I'm after!
Though thats not a bad bonus, haha.
My name is Mega, and I want *ya girl~.*
Do you mind if we take a picture together? I'd like to show Santa that you're all I want for Christmas~.
YOU CAN'T FOOL ME!
HUH? WHAT-
I knew it, they found me AGAIN! Hurry Tea, curse them out in your space language!
You [VIOLENT ALIEN CURSING] with your [%#@#%^&^$%$@#$%^&*(%#] and you think you're so-
No, you idiot! I meant that I'm here to take the girl besides you!
Yo? What's so funny?
You aren't serious, right?
I've been serious since the day my momma held me.
And after I beat you by serenading your girl, we'll go do something incredibly romantic.
So is singing how you guys settle shit on this planet?
Honestly, I've wondered that myself. It wasn't always like this.
Though if it were, I'd say I got pretty lucky with you.
You're annoying.
STILL HERE.
Don't fucking raise your voice at me, kay?
So lemme get this straight.
You wanna battle through singing.
And if you win, you get...her?
Fantastic plan, isn't it? I haven't found a single flaw with it yet.
Freakin' white people.
No, no- I almost lost my cool. Gotta stay calm in front of the beautiful girl there.
What's in it for me?
This has nothing to do with the Fever-Town-Challenge rule, so why on earth should I accept?
Well, if you win-
I'm sure you'll look extremely manly in front of your girl...
It'd be stupid to waste a chance at looking incredibly heroic in front of your girl.
That's silly.
Singing is always fun, but this reasoning behind it is-
Oh thank god you accepted.
I mean, of course you did! Here I was afraid you were gonna be a chicken in front of your girl.
You can't phase me with your weak ass insults!
(Shit. How did they know I'm super hungry?)
Ugh. Let me get the fucking speakers I guess.
